description: After patch of Ia355810b106fee14a55f48081301a310979befac,  retry filter was renamed to IgnoreAttemptedHostsFilter and its variable retry was changed to attempt, so it is better to update nova scheduler and compute logic by replace retry to attempt
title: Change retry to attempt for retry filter logic

comments.content: After patch of Ia355810b106fee14a55f48081301a310979befac,  retry filter was renamed to IgnoreAttemptedHostsFilter and its variable retry was changed to attempt, so it is better to update nova scheduler and compute logic by replace retry to attempt
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/61927
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Changing the key in RPC message payload from retry to attempted will break if old scheduler and new scheduler work in the same environment (typical rolling upgrade scenario).

Discussion going on at https://review.openstack.org/#/c/61003/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo
